definition: to love each other
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions

sentences.english: Her mom replied, “Because they love each other.” MMT
sentences.chinese: 她的妈妈回答道，“因为他们彼此相爱。”

sentences.english: May the years ahead of you filled with love and joy.
sentences.chinese: 祝你们今后年年月月幸福相爱。

sentences.english: Day lining being apt each other in us.
They were a quiet and fond couple.
sentences.chinese: 他们夫妇一向和和睦睦，相亲相爱。

sentences.english: I'll always rember that I've loved U.
sentences.chinese: 即使不管多久，我一直记得我们曾经相爱过。

sentences.english: Yes, easy to spend the hard to love.
After working together for many years, they fell in love with each other.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一起工作多年，最后相爱了。

sentences.english: They love each other, living in fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 他们相亲相爱，生活如在仙境。

sentences.english: No words are required between two loving hearts.
sentences.chinese: 两颗相爱的心之间不需嘦言语。

sentences.english: If I see you next to never , how can we say forever.
sentences.chinese: 假如你不能再回还，岂能相约永相爱。

sentences.english: But if two employees are in love, they will be happy.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果两个员工是相爱的，他们就会开心。

sentences.english: Komi hirose to guelph too tells the story of love he met Richard garments.
sentences.chinese: 广濑给圭太讲述了他和理衣相识相爱的故事。

sentences.english: Li Chen and Fan Bingbing have fallen in love with each other, making (make) a hot topic in the entertainment industry.
sentences.chinese: 李晨和范冰冰相爱了，这成了娱乐界的一个热门话题。

sentences.english: In begone days , I love you and you are.
sentences.chinese: 在逝去的日子里，我们彼此相爱。

sentences.english: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
sentences.chinese: 我这样吩咐你们，是要叫你们彼此相爱。

sentences.english: Hui and Rong fell in love with each other. His lower body became completely paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 辉和蓉相亲相爱，但自从辉受伤后，下半身完全瘫痪。

definition: to love each other
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to stay together/to rely on one another
romance/love (romantic)/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4]
to love dearly
lover/sweetheart
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
to get to know each other/acquaintance
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
matrimony/wedding/marriage/CL:樁|桩[zhuang1],次[ci4]
to be madly in love
pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2
